basics.name: K Atul Shince
basics.label: Junior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Junior Full Stack Developer with a passion for building web applications. Currently seeking opportunities to further develop my skills in a professional setting.

work.name: DeepTerrain AI Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: Owned end-to-end development, design, testing, and delivery of two mission-critical projects: a full-stack military mission control GIS dashboard and a high-performance C++/OpenGL real-time ADAS visualization platform for truck sensor data and vehicle dynamics.
highlights: Architected and delivered a real-time military mission control dashboard using React.js, Node.js, Leaflet.js, and Preact Signals for state management, enabling interactive GIS mapping and mission planning features.
Engineered a C++ and OpenGL-based real-time visualization application for ADAS project, processing and rendering live sensor data on embedded hardware with smooth 120 FPS performance.
Implemented low-latency real-time streaming of processed images to the mission control dashboard using WebSocket technology, ensuring seamless updates for operators in high-stakes environments.

Developed secure encrypted chat messaging system integrated into the mission control application using JWT authentication, enabling confidential communication among multiple users in defense scenarios.
Achieved real-time synchronization of ADAS core platform logic with visualization layer via C++ UDP socket programming, delivering responsive vehicle dynamics rendering with minimal latency.
responsibilities: Solely responsible for full lifecycle ownership of two flagship projects: from requirements gathering and UI/UX design (Figma) through development, testing, deployment, and ongoing maintenance.
Led front-end implementation with React.js, MaterialUI, TailwindCSS, Leaflet.js, and Preact Signals for responsive, interactive GIS and map-based features.
Handled back-end services with Node.js, Express.js, JWT authentication, MongoDB, and real-time Socket programming for secure, scalable data handling.
Developed and optimized low-level C++ OpenGL rendering pipeline for embedded systems (NVIDIA Jetson-compatible), including sensor data visualization and vehicle dynamics simulation.
Managed Docker containerization, Debian packaging, and deployment pipelines to ensure reliable delivery in hybrid/production environments.
achievements: Achieved consistent 120 FPS real-time visualization in ADAS platform through optimized C++ UDP socket integration and OpenGL rendering techniques.
Enabled secure, encrypted real-time communication and data streaming for military-grade mission control, supporting multiple concurrent users without compromising performance or security.
Delivered production-ready end-to-end features for defense and automotive applications, reducing manual visualization efforts and improving operator situational awareness in critical scenarios.

work.name: Digital Solutions FZCO
work.summary: Delivered a front-end library of reusable components and designed wireframes to enhance user experience across web and mobile applications.
highlights: Led 20 projects using ReactJS, Bootstrap, and TailwindCSS, ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
Designed low- and high-fidelity wireframes in Figma, boosting mobile app user engagement by 20%.
responsibilities: Developed responsive front-end interfaces using modern frameworks.
Created visually appealing designs in Figma and Canva.
Streamlined workflows by utilizing Git for version control.
achievements: Enhanced team productivity through delivering reusable UI components with low code requirements.
Successfully improved UX responsiveness, boosting engagement metrics.

work.name: Retrac GmbH
work.summary: Enhancing the UI of critical dashboard tools and contributing to the development of reusable, scalable components.
highlights: Transformed the UI of a critical dashboard tool using NextJS and MaterialUI, improving UI consistency by 25%.
Developed custom components such as breadcrumbs, contracts, and sidebars to improve functionality and navigation.
responsibilities: Redesigned dashboard components for a standardized user experience.
Collaborated with team members to implement features and address UI inconsistencies.
Contributed over 22 pull requests to the repository, most of which were successfully merged.
achievements: Created reusable components that align with the company's design standards.
Enhanced dashboard usability and streamlined UI design processes.

work.name: Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (C-DAC)
work.summary: Developed a blockchain-backed certificate generation system, automating and securing the certification process.
highlights: Reduced certificate generation time tenfold using a dynamic generator built with NodeJS and MongoDB.
Deployed a blockchain solution using Hyperledger Fabric for secure certificate hash storage.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a dynamic certificate generator to automate processes.
Built a custom JavaScript smart contract for blockchain integration.
Streamlined the certification workflow, saving 80% on processing time.
achievements: Reduced verification time by 75% through secure blockchain-based certificate storage.
Automated the certification process, significantly reducing administrative workload.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.
highlights: Awarded 'Volunteer of the Month'
